title: Game Doesnt Load Properly almost 50% of the time
body: Every few games I go into, The game loads and everything visually looks fine but its like the only thing that works is my mouse. I cant use any of my abilities without going and clicking on them and i cant even use hotkeys to open the store or use summoner spells. The only thing thats worked for me is exiting and reloading the game. It has been doing this since before the new client happened and I always dealt with it. It really only impacts me in the sense that I cant provide as good of a leash as id like being a zyra main and not having time to lay down seeds to have my plants tank for the jungler. (irrelevant to the issue but it does affect my playstyle.)

replies.body:
It sounds like you may either have issues with your input settings or there's a background application causing your inputs to not be recognized. I suggest [**performing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure no background applications are causing this issue to occur. I recommend testing any changes in a custom match to avoid Leaverbuster penalties.

Let me know if this caused any change for you.
